#ifndef {{ HEADER_GUARD }}
#define {{ HEADER_GUARD }}

#include "objects.h"        //class definitions and macros to help construct lwm2m objects in C++

namespace nx {
    namespace ID{{ OBJ_ID }} {
        #define ID{{ OBJ_ID }}_RES_COUNT    {{ RES_COUNT }}         //number of resource this object has

        class instance : public lwm2m_instance_base {
        public:
            instance() = default;
            ~instance() = default;

        public:
            {% for item in RESOURCES %}
                {{ item.RES_DATA_TYPE }} {{ item.RES_NAME }};
            {% endfor %}
        };

        class object : public lwm2m_object_base {
        public:
            object() : lwm2m_object_base({{ OBJ_ID }}) {};
            ~object() = default;

            //Lwm2mResource definitions
            {% for item in RESOURCES %}
            RESOURCE({{ item.RES_ID }}, {{ item.RES_INST_TYPE }}, {{ item.RES_OP }}, (member_pointer)(&instance::{{ item.RES_NAME }}),
                    MEMBER_SIZE(instance::{{ item.RES_NAME }}), {{ item.RES_NAME }});
            {% endfor %}

        public:

            /**
            * @brief interface function to return a pointer array of all the resource a derived object has
            * @param[out] res_count: number of the total resources
            * @return array of pointers to the resources an object has
            */
            lwm2m_object_resource **get_all_res(size_t *res_count) override {
                *res_count = ID{{ OBJ_ID }}_RES_COUNT;
                return all_res;
            }

        private:
            //define all resources
            lwm2m_object_resource* all_res[ID{{ OBJ_ID }}_RES_COUNT] {
                {% for item in RESOURCES %}&{{ item.RES_NAME }}{% if loop.index < (loop.length) %},{% endif %}
                {% endfor %}
            }
        };
    }
}

#endif  //{{ HEADER_GUARD }}
